meanings.sent1: The bustling avenue was lined with shops and cafes.
meanings.sent2: I walked down the avenue to get to the park.
meanings.sent3: The avenue was so wide that it could fit a parade of elephants!

meanings.sent5: The avenue stretched out before me, inviting me to explore its secrets.

meanings.definition: A way of approaching a problem or making progress.
meanings.sent1: Communication is the best avenue to resolve misunderstandings.
meanings.sent2: Hard work is the avenue to achieving your goals.
meanings.sent3: Using humor as an avenue to diffuse tension can be quite effective.
meanings.sent4: Patience can be the avenue that leads to success in difficult situations.
meanings.sent5: Education is the avenue that opens doors to new opportunities.
